MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the  L35  postcode area of Rainhill affecting properties in Ashton Avenue, Galston Avenue and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:06PM. Our engineers have established that there is a fault on the underground cable network and that repairs will be complex so we are awaiting delivery of generators to restore power, and this should happen by midnight. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at  9PM on 15th March 2021
